PackageOracle.name: DA_ENTITLEMENT_AUTH_SET
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ENTITLEMENT_AUTH_SET
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.51.615195000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,entitlement_auth_set_nm IN VARCHAR2
,begin_valid_dt IN DATE
,end_valid_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,entitlement_auth_set_nm IN VARCHAR2
,begin_valid_dt IN DATE
,end_valid_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,entitlement_auth_set_id IN NUMBER
,entitlement_auth_set_nm IN VARCHAR2
,begin_valid_dt IN DATE
,end_valid_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,entitlement_auth_set_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_entitlement_auth_set;

body.name: DA_ENTITLEMENT_AUTH_SET
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ENTITLEMENT_AUTH_SET
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.51.626060000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,entitlement_auth_set_nm IN VARCHAR2
,begin_valid_dt IN DATE
,end_valid_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_entitlement_auth_set.add(fx), parms=' || entitlement_auth_set_nm || '|' || begin_valid_dt || '|' || end_valid_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_entitlement_auth_set a
(
a.entitlement_auth_set_id
,a.entitlement_auth_set_nm
,a.begin_valid_dt
,a.end_valid_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_entitlement_auth_set_id.NEXTVAL
,add.entitlement_auth_set_nm
,add.begin_valid_dt
,add.end_valid_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.entitlement_auth_set_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_entitlement_auth_set.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,entitlement_auth_set_nm IN VARCHAR2
,begin_valid_dt IN DATE
,end_valid_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_entitlement_auth_set.add, parms=' || entitlement_auth_set_nm || '|' || begin_valid_dt || '|' || end_valid_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_entitlement_auth_set a
(
a.entitlement_auth_set_id
,a.entitlement_auth_set_nm
,a.begin_valid_dt
,a.end_valid_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_entitlement_auth_set_id.NEXTVAL
,add.entitlement_auth_set_nm
,add.begin_valid_dt
,add.end_valid_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_entitlement_auth_set.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,entitlement_auth_set_id IN NUMBER
,entitlement_auth_set_nm IN VARCHAR2
,begin_valid_dt IN DATE
,end_valid_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_entitlement_auth_set.add, parms=' || entitlement_auth_set_id || '|' || entitlement_auth_set_nm || '|' || begin_valid_dt || '|' || end_valid_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_entitlement_auth_set a
(
a.entitlement_auth_set_id
,a.entitlement_auth_set_nm
,a.begin_valid_dt
,a.end_valid_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.entitlement_auth_set_id
,add.entitlement_auth_set_nm
,add.begin_valid_dt
,add.end_valid_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_entitlement_auth_set.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,entitlement_auth_set_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_entitlement_auth_set.del, parms=' || entitlement_auth_set_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_entitlement_auth_set a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.entitlement_auth_set_id = del.entitlement_auth_set_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_entitlement_auth_set.del');

END del;

END da_entitlement_auth_set;
